subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A bloop ignited a five-run rally in the seventh inning, and the unforgiving Royals capitalized to beat the Blue Jays and take a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series.
snippet: A bloop ignited a five-run rally in the seventh inning, and the unforgiving Royals capitalized to beat the Blue Jays and take a 2-0 lead in the best-of-seven series.
